content: I’m still processing, but I finally got to see a screening of Eno, and with Gary (the filmmaker) no less! I cannot remember the last time I was so inspired by a film. I was already a massive Eno fan, but seeing this just took it to a whole new level. And what Gary is doing to enable a new kind of storytelling is absolutely incredible. If you haven’t seen the film, go see a screening or book one in your city.
